What am I doing when I’m making art?

I spend a lot of my free time making artwork on my computer. I thought it would be useful to write down some reflections on that process,

I make a lot of artwork and small projects. My creative process is something that I developed organically, but over time I’ve met other creators and learned from their practice, I’ve put more time into the way that I go about things, and thought it would be worthwhile to put somet thoughts into writing.

Why do I do this?
